title: High Protein Chicken Pasta Salad Bowl
description: A high-protein, high-fiber, low-calorie pasta salad ideal for meal prep. Each serving is around 500 calories and 43-46 grams of protein.

instructions.name: Dressing Preparation
steps: Squeeze one lemon (or use two as per ingredient list).
Combine the lemon juice, Greek yogurt, a dash of Dijon mustard, a touch of honey, a touch of garlic, and salt and pepper to taste.
Optionally, add a small amount of hot sauce.

instructions.name: Mixing it all together
steps: Layer the components in the following order: dressing, cucumber, tomato, chickpeas, pasta, chicken, chorizo, avocado, and finally lettuce for crunch.

instructions.name: Serving
steps: Give the salad a shake and eat immediately, or store for later use as a meal prep option.
